sections.title: Choose Your Learning Path
sections.content: Welcome to FRCCodeLab! This comprehensive training platform is designed to help you master programming concepts for robotics competitions. Select the training path that best fits your needs and experience level.

sections.title: About Each Section:
sections.content:
• Java Training: Master the fundamentals of Java programming including variables, data types, control structures, loops, and object-oriented programming concepts.
  • FTC-Specific Training: Learn programming techniques and strategies specifically designed for FIRST Tech Challenge robotics competitions.
  • FRC-Specific Training: Dive into WPILib, command-based programming, motor control, and PID controllers for FIRST Robotics Competition.
  • Competitive Training: Develop strategic thinking, teamwork skills, and competitive analysis techniques for robotics competitions.

sections.title: How to Navigate:
sections.content: Click on any of the training sections above to explore that area. Each section contains multiple lessons that you can access through the sidebar navigation. We recommend starting with Java Training if you're new to programming, or jumping directly to your specific competition type if you have prior experience.
